titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Persis Corporation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named corporation upon the transfer to the Smithsonian Institution of all interests held by the corporation in a specified collection of the stamps and postal history of Hawaii.
